tech_news.title: Ubisoft Has Reportedly Killed One of Its Biggest Franchises for Good - ComicBook.com
tech_news.description: Ubisoft has reportedly killed one of its biggest franchises for good, only a decade after it debuted with great promise on PS4 and Xbox One.

tech_news.title: What's The Biggest Difference Between Ford's Coyote And GM's LS Engines? - Jalopnik
tech_news.description: The biggest differences between Ford's Coyote and GM's LS engines are their camshaft locations and their sizes. The Ford engines also produce more horsepower.

tech_news.title: Microsoft just issued a second emergency OS update for Windows 11 this month - Windows Central
tech_news.description: Another out of band update has been issued to Windows 11 users to address a major bug that caused Outlook to become inoperable after January's disastrous Patch Tuesday updates.

tech_news.title: Gmail Glitch Appears to Break Email Filtering, Tabbed Inboxes - PCMag
tech_news.description: Marketing emails that should appear in the Promotions tab are flooding people's Primary inboxes. Google says it's 'actively working to resolve the issue.'

Woman Tries To Buy Honda. The Manager Refuses Unless She Agrees To A Date. Then He Adds $10,000 To The Price After She Says No - Motor1.com
tech_news.description: A woman says a Honda sales manager refused to sell her a car unless she agreed to a date. When she declined, he added $10K to the price. What now?

tech_news.description: The company is letting users turn their own selfies into shareable memes.
